Text.Page: Sorry—I only process requests from guild masters who have yet to join an alliance.

Which alliance strikes your heart's desire?

The Comerciantes Livres attracts money while the União Iluminada attracts favor and reputation, and the Ordem de Ferro values combat above all.

Just let me know, and I'll get you all signed up!
Sorry, we only take applications from guild masters.
Oh! We aren't quite ready for volunteers right now. Try back later.
